name: Fading Candle
description: A candle that you picked up in the ruins after completing the duel against TheKnave.  Legends passed down claim that when the candle's flame flickers in the handsof sinners, the light may become shadows, making footsteps faint and maskingfatal intent.  You cannot tell what material this is made of, and it weeps no wax afterburning, releasing only black ash that scatters into the wind, driftingtowards the distant unknown.
